meta.description: Optimize the number of small and large buses to hire for a school field trip to transport at least 500 students with parking constraints.

sets.name: BUS_TYPES
sets.description: Types of buses available for hire

params.name: capacity
params.description: Capacity of each type of bus

params.name: total_students
params.description: Total number of students to transport

vars.name: num_buses
vars.description: Number of each type of bus to hire

objective.name: min_total_buses
objective.description: Minimize the total number of buses hired

constraints.name: student_transportation_requirement
constraints.description: Ensure at least 500 students can be transported

constraints.name: large_bus_parking_limit
constraints.description: Limit the number of large buses to 20% of the total buses
